name: Neighborhood Jog
description:
How to Play: Tap the movement keys to jog at your chosen speed, or hold the movement keys to jog quickly.

Keyboard: Arrow Keys or WSAD to move.

Controller: Left Stick or Right Stick to aim. While aiming, use any button to move.

Mouse: Left mouse button to move relative to the onscreen joystick.

Touchscreen: Tap to move relative to the onscreen joystick.

Use the "C" key on the keyboard to turn off the constantly cycling art if it is annoying or causes dizziness! Use the "R" key to restart the game.

Game by Chris Turd Boomerang Armstrong.

Soundtrack: Life Cycle EP, by Spacespy. Check out his BAFTA award-winning game Egglien, coming soon to Steam!

Special thanks to CardboardMoon and Riverbottom for their help with coloring and palettes!
